754620.name: High School Simulator
754620.description:
Japanese High School Life.
You can experience the school in the 3D world

[Game Function]
1.You Can Customize Boy and Girl.
2.Ｏperate a High School Student.

[How to Play]
Operate with XBOX Controller or Keyboard

keyboard
A : Left Move
D : Right Move
W: Front Move
S : Back Move
Space: Jump
Q: Grab human / Pick up item
F: Crouch / Attack
T: Action Button
Left Shift : Dash
LeftControl (LeftCommand) : Vision
Mouse L Click + Mouse Move: Camera Move

Xbox Controller
A: Jump
B: Grab human / Pick up item
X: Crouch / Attack
Y: Action Button
L: Dash
R: Vision
D-pad: Player Walk Move
L Stick = Player Move
R Stick = Camera Move
754620.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
